verses.name: Judges 19:12
verses.text: And his master said unto him, We will not turn aside hither into the city of a stranger, that is not of the children of Israel; we will pass over to Gibeah.

verses.name: Judges 19:13
verses.text: And he said unto his servant, Come, and let us draw near to one of these places to lodge all night, in Gibeah, or in Ramah.

verses.name: Judges 19:14
verses.text: And they passed on and went their way; and the sun went down upon them when they were by Gibeah, which belongeth to Benjamin.
